effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 648,147 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 281,144.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Flip to the next section.

 (1 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Every 5 sec spent in combat lashes a nearby enemy dealing 90,090 Shadow damage. This deals up to 100% additional damage based on the enemy's missing health.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: When a nearby enemy or devout ally falls, you siphon a portion of their soul to gain 480 Intellect for 10 min.

Equip: When an ally falls below 20% health you shield them in darkness absorbing the next 198,074 damage taken.

This effect can trigger once every 30 sec and does not target devout allies.
